message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA. 

The paper deals with reinforcement learning and hierarchical abstractions, which are commonly studied in the subfield of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The learning of reusable options and the incorporation of situational awareness are topics that fall under the umbrella of machine learning (cs.LG). The use of these options in a RoboCup soccer domain suggests a focus on robotics and control (cs.RO), while the use of a probabilistic goal semi-Markov decision process suggests a focus on systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the use of a policy gradient algorithm suggests a focus on mathematical optimization (cs.MA).
